SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.view

Class PlayerView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.view.PlayerView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerView extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the player's view. The class contains a series of getters to access their personal goals, their goal tiles, their Bookshelfs, chats and a series of other player related relevant information.
See Also:
